message.body: Huge huge favor Can you bring my charger over the next time you go out? My mom really needs it
Yeah, dawg. 7?
I dropped the stuff of!
Will be a little late to mural. Probably get there at 8?
It's cool, see you then!
Sorayaaa!
I'm stuck in the cafeteria listening to directions!! I don't understand
Just come to the art room when you're out of there
Dear left foot, Welcome to The Great Wart Scare of 2013
HAHAHAHHAHAHAHA FEEL THE WRATH OF THE WART
I TOLD YOU
OMG INSTAMATIC PLAYED A SHOW 4 DAYS AGO AND WE MISSED IT
Wanna go get breakfast food
RACHEL
Breakfast food
Ack! sorry, i was at home depot. yes! although i do need to be home at a reasonable time to tend to my wart
(ps will u be picking me up for breakfast food)
HAhahaha the wart. I legally can but my mother doesn't want me to
RAXHLLLLL
LETS GO TO A DINER
what if you come over, help me with my wart, and then we go to a diner. my parents will probably let me out later than usual cause of senior service. i
just really want to get this out of the way/i've been thinking about taking a shower since early this morning
Take a shower, then come over and I'll help you with the wart I have wart supplies. Then diner
I just bought "wartSTICK" solid stick wart remover. it's salyicylic acid. that's right, right?
What is Kara's Senior Cabarecital....
Don't use it yet
A recital
Just kara? and my dr told me to take a shower, rub all my skin off with a pumice stone, and then put duct tape on it
No no no doctors do NOT know what's up. Let me help you. Take a shower but don't do anything to it
What am I supposed to do?
I shall show you
Bring your wart stick
Soraya will you plz just come over I am very scared and out like to do this in the comfort of my own home
Why are you scared? I can't get a ride there! I would need you to drive me anyway so you might as well come over! Plus I have more supplies
I really don't think we should be sharing wart supplies. that seems like a recipe for disaster
OMG Rachel calm down I haven't used these wart supplies before. Besides even if I had, it's acid it's not going to carry any bacteria or fungus
SORAYA WARTS ARE SO FRIGHTENING. DO YOU NOT REMEMBER THE GREAT WART SSCCAARREE OF 2012?! i'll come pick you up for breakfast in 10 minutes
Are we going to deal with your wart? You have to trust me on this. Pick me up from max's?
Maybe after breakfast. Meet me at that parking lot
Ten minutes?
Yeah!
I'm heEeEerEeree
Sorayaaaaaa
Coming
Soraya are you awake
What's up
I feel like I'm not making any progress and I've been scraping my foot for like 30 minutes
What do you mean? Is the skin not coming off?
Nah, the skin is kind of coming off but the wart looks pretty much the same
Yes it will at first. Just rub as much as possible and then apply the acid and cover with duct tape.
Bring the real acid tomorrow if you can find it
Turns out I dont have a car this morning (womp womp). Do you still want a ride from Dwight? (if you don't respond by the time I leave, I'll assume no)
Sure
SORAYAAAAA
Idk if youre awake yet but plz bring a canvas bag when you come outside
I'm feeling very tempted to blow off the concert
HAHAHHAHAAH
Can I get a ride today as well?
Yes, but if you aren't outside when I get there, I'll cry in the car ride over there
What time are you coming
So that I can be prepared
Running late, I'll be there in 5
Coming
